job_details.Vacaturetitel: Full Stack Software Engineer - CRM Developer
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Technical Development for CRM Solutions: Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio, utilising advanced resources such as API integrations, Braze technologies, and Google Cloud functions. You'll be responsible for developing solutions like GenAI Copywriting Assistant, Dynamic Content Campaigns, Automated Campaign Composer and Sender.
     * In-Braze Implementation: Continue the technical development by implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid. Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions.
     * Innovation & Solution Execution: Engage stakeholders to understand business needs and design innovative technical solutions. Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities, ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals. Provide crucial technological inputs and collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility and alignment.
     * Product Partnership: Work closely with the Product team to ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK. A key priority is to reduce silos between departments and align technologies.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Software Engineer - CRM Developer

* Technical Development for CRM Solutions: Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio, utilising advanced resources such as API integrations, Braze technologies, and Google Cloud functions. You'll be responsible for developing solutions like GenAI Copywriting Assistant, Dynamic Content Campaigns, Automated Campaign Composer and Sender.
     * In-Braze Implementation: Continue the technical development by implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid. Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions.
     * Innovation & Solution Execution: Engage stakeholders to understand business needs and design innovative technical solutions. Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities, ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals. Provide crucial technological inputs and collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility and alignment.
     * Product Partnership: Work closely with the Product team to ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK. A key priority is to reduce silos between departments and align technologies.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing CRM solutions and campaign capabilities, including AI-powered assistants. While it mentions GenAI, the core responsibilities and technologies listed (API integrations, Braze, Google Cloud functions, JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, Liquid, App Scripts) are more aligned with traditional full-stack development and marketing automation rather than the core ML/GenAI engineering tasks of model building, fine-tuning, or deep generative model research. The role appears to be primarily focused on the application and integration of AI tools within a CRM context, rather than the development or deep customization of the AI models themselves, fitting the 'use of AI tools to enhance productivity' aspect of the Ambiguous profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio, utilising advanced resources such as API integrations, Braze technologies, and Google Cloud functions' and 'developing solutions like GenAI Copywriting Assistant, Dynamic Content Campaigns, Automated Campaign Composer and Sender'. It also details 'implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid' and 'Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions'. These are all core software development activities focused on building and integrating features.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio, utilising advanced resources such as API integrations, Braze technologies, and Google Cloud functions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid' describes the coding and implementation of features within a software system.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions' points to integrating and extending existing software functionalities through scripting and APIs.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Engage stakeholders to understand business needs and design innovative technical solutions' directly relates to understanding business requirements and translating them into technical plans.
job_tasks.phrase: Engage stakeholders to understand business needs and design innovative technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility to 'Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities, ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals' involves managing the software development lifecycle and ensuring it meets business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities, ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Provide crucial technological inputs and collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility and alignment' indicates a need to understand technical constraints and align them with business and product goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide crucial technological inputs and collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility and alignment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with the Product team to ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK' involves software integration and maintenance tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with the Product team to ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK

job_tasks.justification: The priority 'reduce silos between departments and align technologies' implies a need to understand how different business units and their technologies interact and to facilitate alignment, which is a business understanding task.
job_tasks.phrase: reduce silos between departments and align technologies

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI Copywriting Assistant' suggests the use or integration of generative AI models, which falls under the modeling category, even if the primary role is not building the model from scratch.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with the Product team
Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation
reduce silos between departments and align technologies
